properties.name: Isthmus Engineering
properties.description: Posted by Dulouz4035 Owl Creek Drive Madison, WIFrom our beginning as an engineering partnership to our incorporation as a workers\' cooperative, Isthmus Engineering has evolved into a world-class builder of automated equipment. Our company was started with the idea that quality designs and first-class manufacturing could be accomplished by a small collective of motivated individuals. Although we\'ve grown in size, our initial objective has remained unchanged.

properties.name: Just Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Dulouz 100 S. Baldwin St Madison, WIJust Coffee is committed to 100% fair trade as our business model and not simply as a market opportunity. We offer micro-batch roasted, fairly-traded, naturally grown, great-tasting coffees at a low price. When you buy our coffee you can be sure that a large part of your money is going directly to the growers and their communities. We invite you to help us build a more just economic model and a better world for all of us.

properties.name: Just Us Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Dulouz Hwy 1 Wolfville, Nova ScotiaThis fair trade, worker cooperative coffee roaster (and cafe) began in 1995 by working with Chiapas farmers to create a new economy based on the principles of the cooperative movement

properties.name: Union Cab of Madison Cooperative
properties.description: Posted by Dulouz2458 Pennsylvania Avenue Madison WIUnion Cab is a 200+ member Worker Cooperative. Since day one, we have operated as a democratic workplace with one member/one vote. A board of directors consisting of an elected group of drivers, mechanics and dispatchers governs Union Cab. We believe that our structure helps customers have a voice in the top levels of our organization by making our worker the top level.
